title: Manufacturing Virtual Assistant (Production-Focused)
job_overview:
We are looking for a detail-oriented and resourceful Manufacturing Virtual Assistant to support the back-end production side of launching a premium streetwear brand. This role is focused on turning finalized designs into real products by managing vendor sourcing, sample logistics, and file handoff for manufacturing.
Key Responsibilities:
Source manufacturers (cut & sew, embroidery, screen printing, DTG)


Communicate with vendors to collect pricing, MOQs, and sample timelines


Organize and prepare tech packs and artwork files for manufacturer use


Keep vendor spreadsheets updated with contacts, pricing, and order statuses


Research and recommend fabric options and finishes


Coordinate sample production and quality tracking


Manage production files (mockups, tech packs, print placements) in Google Drive


Prepare print files (vector cleanup, format conversion)


Help create packaging references like hangtags or stickers


Track shipments and manage sample/production timelines
